go_data.justification: SLC26A7 is involved in iodide transport at the apical membrane of thyroid follicular cells.
SLC26A7 plays a crucial role in thyroid hormone synthesis by transporting iodide into thyroid follicular cells.
SLC26A7 is localized at the apical membrane of thyroid follicular cells and renal tubular cells.
SLC26A7 functions as an anion exchanger, transporting chloride and other anions across cell membranes.
